name: Raspberry Pi 4 Model B
description:

…and robot brains, smart home hub, media centre, networked AI core, factory controller, and much more

name: Raspberry Pi 3 Model A+
description: Our third-generation single-board Computer, now in the A+ format.

name: Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+
description: The final revision of ou third-generation single-board computer

name: Raspberry Pi 3 Model B
description: Single-board computer with wireless LAN and Bluetooth connectivity

name: Raspberry Pi 2 Model B
description: The Raspberry Pi 2 Model B is the second-generation Raspberry Pi. It replaced the original Raspberry Pi 1 Model B+ in February 2015.

name: Raspberry Pi 1 Model B+
description: The Model B+ is the final revision of the original Raspberry Pi. It replaced the Model B in July 2014 and was superseded by the Raspberry Pi 2 Model B

name: Raspberry Pi 1 Model A+
description: The Model A+ is the low-cost variant of the Raspberry Pi. It replaced the original Model A in November 2014.

name: Raspberry Pi Zero W
description: The Raspberry Pi Zero W extends the Pi Zero family and comes with added wireless LAN and Bluetooth connectivity.

name: Raspberry Pi Zero
description: The Raspberry Pi Zero is half the size of a Model A+, with twice the utility. A tiny Raspberry Pi that’s affordable enough for any project!
